basic_info.name: NIO Goa Admission
description: Admission to this Institute is based purely on merit and to secure admission in the college you need to meet the basic eligibility criteria of the courses.
Applicants need to clear UGC-NET/ JRIF followed by interviews for Ph.D. admission. Admissions to this college are done in online mode only.

basic_info.name: How to Apply?
description: Shortlisted candidates will be called for interviews and the decision of selection of the candidate will be based on their performance.

faqs.question: What to do if I have not received my login credentials?
faqs.answer: If the candidate has not received their login credentials, they are requested to check their spam folder in the mail section. If the candidate still fails to find the details, then kindly contact info@acsir.res.in for further communication.

faqs.question: Is there any Application fee for Online Admission?
faqs.answer: No, the Candidate does not have to pay any online fee for the application.

faqs.question: Can a Candidate fill more than one application for a single program?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, a candidate cannot fill multiple applications for a single program. Indulging in any such activity will result in immediate termination and rejection of candidature.

faqs.question: As my preference, how many Institutes can I apply for?
faqs.answer: The maximum allowed number is 3. Hence, Candidates can provide three preferences for CSIR Labs or Institutes while applying for admission.

faqs.question: Does the candidate need to send a hard copy of the application form to CSIR Office?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, Candidate need not send any hard copy of the application form to CSIR Office.

faqs.question: Will, I need to visit the Individual CSIR Labs or Institutes for my Interview?
faqs.answer: Yes, the candidate will need to visit the Individual CSIR Labs or Institutes for the Personal Interview.
